Errors.ServerDownSubtitle: Edforma cannot reach it's servers. Try again later.
Errors.LoginErrorSubtitle: There was an error logging in: '%{error}'. Please try again later.
Errors.ServerUnavailableSubtitle: Edforma is currently unavailable. Try again later.
Errors.CoursesUnavailableSubtitle: There was an error loading your courses: '%{error}'. Please try again later.

Login.Header: Please sign into your district account.

Courses.TipSubtitle: Tap a course to see assignments for that course.

Settings.EditProfileSubtitle: Change the name Edforma uses to identify you.
Settings.ProfileSetSubtitle: Edforma will now refer to you as '%{name}'
Settings.ProfileResetSubtitle: Edforma will now refer to you as how the district refers to you.
Settings.LogOutSubtitle: Remove your district account from Edforma.
Settings.LogOutDialogBody: Are you sure you want to log out of Edforma?
Settings.LogOutSuccessSubtitle: You have been logged out of Edforma.

About.Header: Thank you to the wonderful people below, who have helped make Edforma possible.

Debug.InvalidateSessionSubtitle: Change auth token to a false one. This simulates an expired token event.
Debug.ForceUpdateSubtitle: Check for an update from EAS. It will be installed if available!
